markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Envenomed Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1254)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare is coated with [giant wasp venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=115) and tipped with needles, which deliver the venom to the first creature to enter the square. That creature takes 4d6 damage (DC 23 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex) and, on a failure, the creature is exposed to the giant wasp venom.

**Craft Requirements** Supply 2 doses of giant wasp venom.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Envenomed Snare
